title: House for rent in family friendly neighborhood- 3bed 1.5bath
description:
Open house this Saturday & Sunday May 14th & 15th 10am to 1pm
House is currently occupied. Photos of the house are from when the house was purchased a few years ago. Lease would start July 1st but could start as early as June 15th with a pro-rated 1st months rent (2 weeks).
We are putting our house up for rent. This 3 bedroom 1.5 Bath twin is on a diverse and family friendly tree-lined street. The house would be ideal for a young family and is in Cheltenham School District. Wyncote Elementary, EP, Cedarbrook Middle School and Cheltenham High School. Lots of neighborhood kids ages 3 to 8. 15-20min walk to Curtis Arboretum and just up the hill from a scenic creek and open park area. 20 min walk to Elkins Park train station. 5 minute drive to Jenkintown/Wyncote train station.
Inside: Open living / dining room which flows to the kitchen with newer appliances and a peninsula. Kitchen leads to the unheated mud room and outside to the back deck. Newer washer and dryer and updated half bath in basement. Upstairs there are 3 bedrooms and a full bathroom (freshly painted) with claw foot tub. Lots of storage in the attic which can be accessed via pull down steps. 1 car garage has been converted into a small workshop and has power but no heat (not big enough to park a car inside).
Outside: Small front covered porch which looks over the garden. Large deck in rear is great for entertaining and there is small yard. Driveway is shared with one parking spot available.
Please note we are currently doing work cleaning up the basement and will be replacing the upstairs bathroom floor.
No pets. No smoking.
Total monthly income must be 3x monthly rent
640+ credit score
Tenant to pay gas, electric and water. (Average $250 a month for a family of 3 living in the house full-time, both adults working remote)
1 year lease: first month, last month and one month security deposit due at signing.
House is wired for Fios but not Xfinity (I’m sure they would be happy to come out and run wires).
Please fill out the pre-qualification form linked below to receive the address for the open house. I will not reply to emails about the property. I will only reply to people who complete the pre-qualification form.
https://forms.gle/MzzxHpr9st15nES6A

title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Wood Floors, Package Room
description:
The studio apartment home at 610 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home has wood floors. This home on the 6th floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as June 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Indulge in a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Have ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!

title: 5 bedrooms 3 baths, a block from SJU campus
description:
Fabulous 5 bedroom 3 bathroom house on Church Rd currently occupied by students from St. Joe's. This row Home is situated behind St. Joseph University's new dorm/parking lot and is just a block from campus. Entering the house from the front covered porch, you will see an ample living room with fireplace and wood flooring. The large kitchen with island and tile backsplash is perfect for entertaining and is open to the spacious dining area/living room. Two big refrigerators offer enough space for tenants to store their foods and drinks.There is a large bedroom and a full bath on the first floor, and three large bedrooms and a full bath on the second floor. A furnished studio is also available on request for a single or fifth student, which is separated from the main unit of the house. It is a newly renovated and furnished studio with its own entrance/kitchen/bathroom. Laundry is in the basement. Wood Flooring throughout most of the home. A couple of minutes walk to nearby McDonalds, Wendy's and other restaurants. Septa #1, #44, #52 and #65 stops are just 1-2 of minutes walk, 5-10 minutes walk to Bala shopping center, LA fitness. 3-5 minutes drive to Target, 10-15 minutes to Center city/university city, and 25 minutes to King of Prussia.
KEY FEATURES
- Rent is $2500 entire house plus utilities.
- Basic furniture available on request at no cost.
- Lease : one calendar/academic year
- security Deposit: $2500.
- window AC/Radiators and baseboard Heaters
- No pets
- No drugs/smoking/alcohol in house.
- Credit score >700, except for students

title: Large 2 bedroom 2 bathroom in Manayunk
description:
Apartment hunting has been difficult for lots of people lately.  We have personally been 100% occupied and leased for the last few months.  We are currently leased up through July; however, this 2 bedroom 2 bath just came on the books for early July!  The residents moving out are the only residents who have every lived in this unit for the last 16 years!  Grab it while you can, details are below.
Apt. 310
Move-in Date:  7/9/2022
Pets:  NO, this is our only non-pet building :(
Parking:  FREE & open, no reserved spots
Term:  12 months
Base Rent:  $1,985.00
Trash: $12/month
Utilities:  Separate, you will set up gas and electric and pay them directly.  Water is paid through the rental portal
Flooring:  Currently carpeted with new pile carpet being installed, bathrooms and kitchen both have tile flooring.  Willing to install hardwood flooring in the main areas, carpet in the bedrooms only for an additional $100 per month bringing your base rent to $2,085.00 per month.  Tile flooring will stay in kitchen and bathrooms.
Video Tour Unit:  here is a video tour of a comparable unit https://youtu.be/kHGVlj4Lc3w
Common Area Video Tour:  https://youtu.be/yyqSjFx0BNA
If you are interested in renting this unit it will be on our website www.theglenphilly.com tonight after midnight.  First one to put down a deposit and have their application approved will lease this unit.
The application process is below:
1.	Locate the apartment you want to rent on www.theglenphilly.com and hit “select”.
2.	Complete the application on all parts and submit with the $500.00 security deposit and $50.00 application fee per person.
3.	Send proof of income and photo ID to  show contact info
.
4.	If approved with good credit your deposit remains $500.00.  Approved conditionally the deposit is one month’s rent, the $500.00 initial deposit will go towards that and you would owe the balance at move in.  If denied, the deposit is refunded in check form.
5.	If you decide our community is not right for you after applying, you have 72 hours from applying to cancel in writing (email) to receive your refund of the $500.00.  The deposit is NOT REFUNDABLE after 72 hours if you cancel your application.
6.	Your gross monthly income (this is income before taxes) must equal three times the monthly rent to be approved.  Incomes are combined. There is a line for additional income such as student loans, savings or investments.
7.	Twenty-four hours before move-in, you would pay your admin/city fees of $330.00, any pet fees if applicable and the first month’s rent.

title: Unique & Stylish! Open concept 3 bed 2 bath house in Filter Sq!
description:
515 S. 27th Street – Available August 1
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit
